Name: The Day They Landed
About the game: The Day They Landed Saucers have emerged from the heavens. As they land, aliens are invading our planet. Confident in their power but fearful of the defending civilians, they are body snatching inanimate objects and translocating between them to get the upper hand in a fight for humanity. Game Features Asymmetrical gameplay - Virtual reality player vs. FPS desktop player Arcade Mode for quicker gameplay Film mode for that classic feel Two gameplay maps - Farm and Department Store More to come!
